features: 【Spray Mops for Floor Cleaning】Chose Eyliden Spray Mop, It has responsive spray head allows you to spray as much or as little liquid as you desire. Save unnecessary time and frustration moping up water. Add in our 360°swivel head and get around bulky, heavy furniture without the headache of moving it all around. Ergonomic handgrip control and rod length, you can do cleaning without the need to bend or crouch. Make floor cleaning easy and simple.

【Wet & Dry Spray Mops】Features to used as both wet and dry mop, this microfiber mops for floor cleaning uses the magics of microfibers to absorbed the smallest dirt and dust, and used as a wet mop to clean wooden floor, hardwood, vinyl, linoleum, cement, tile, laminate, stone and concrete floors . Dry Rubbing,wiping waxing without change equipment.

【22 oz Large Bottle】Now, Leave the heavy messy bucket alone! Refillable spray mop come with the 22 oz bottle, you could fill it up with your favorite cleaner, just make sure clean the water tank when you finished the cleaning. Simply push the trigger, it turns water to water mist evenly, save water and make mopping efficiency with minimize efforts than the regular mop. Compared with other spray mops, it has a larger capacity and can clean more area without frequent replenishment.

【2pcs Microfiber Mop Pads】2pcs features excellent Water Absorption performance microfiber pads to collect dust, hairs and debris easily, efficient and durable for wet and dry use. has the dual functions of removing stubborn stains and absorbing water, make the mop which is suitable for different cleaning scenarios.

【Any Occasion Mops for Floor Cleaning】Use as a Wet Mop perfect for all types of surface areas including wooden floors, kitchen, restaurant, bathroom, garages, warehouses, office floors, under the couch, floorboards, tile floors, marble floors, wall, glass window,and hardwood ect.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Why Choose Eyliden Spray Mop？ Just one simple squeeze the trigger on the top handle, spraying mist effect helps you r floor drying quickly, stay shiny. Effective in controlling the water mist, easy to use and efficient in moping;Ergonomic design 47.2 inch Handle, suitable for most people's height, no bend down, free your back;Save water and your efforts with the refillable 22 oz Bottle;One hand operation design, lightweight and easy to move around;360 Swivel Mop Head design, mopping house thoroughly. It can reach out every corner of your place, like under the couch, wardrobe or bed and so on no hiding dirt in your house.

Eyliden Cares About Every Corner of Your Life Eyliden mop perfect for all types of surface areas including wooden floors, kitchen floors, restaurant floors, bathroom floors, garages, warehouses, office floors, tile floors, marble floors, wall, glass window,and hardwood.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 3, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It has a powerful spray which is what I wanted
reviews.reviewText: I bought this mop for my residential cleaning business.My hope is that it lasts longer than all of the other ones I've tried!Time will tell and I will update!This sprays really nice (so far as I've only used it 4 times) and has the biggest tank of any mop I've purchased/researched.(Bona's MIGHT be a bit bigger but I would only buy that over priced mop if I want to be frustrated.)It comes with 2 mop heads and I love the look and color of this mop which also helped me make up my mind.SO easy to put together and to refill the tank, taking that off is even easier!Bottom line~I LOVE IT!!(This is the 5th brand I've purchased from Amazon and am super satisfied.)Time will tell tho.Every single mop I've purchased has only lasted 1 month.I personally believe they should last longer but because they offer a subscription, they are fully aware of the fact that it only lasts so long.Longer, I'm sure, for people that don't clean 10 houses a week.Also, very good price and it actually has a much better feel to it (as in, not cheap) than the other mops I've purchased.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice wet/dry mop
reviews.reviewText: You can use this either way. I haven't used the sprayer yet. The solution I bought is a spray bottle. Comes with two washable pads, so that you don't have more trash and you can clean them easily. Nicely made.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Inexpensive and high quality
reviews.reviewText: I was very impressed at the quality of this mop and pads for the price. I may even buy a second one.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars This item is simple to use. It gets the job done.
reviews.reviewText: The container on this product (plastic bottle )is a “little difficult to remove. I like it because it light.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 26, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Everything I was looking for in a mop.
reviews.reviewText: I am so impressed with this mop! I was looking to get away from the swiffer I use in the RV because it just wasn’t efficient. This mop allows me to use whatever cleaning solution I want, and I can leave fluid in the bottle so it’s always ready to go. This is important if you use it often. I was surprised at the quality of the pads. They’re thick and absorbent, easy to place on and remove, and never move no matter how hard you scrub. They also wash out easily even if you wash them by hand. I highly recommend this mop over any of the other replaceable pad type of mops on the market.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars better than swifter !
reviews.reviewText: This is ideal ! Doesn't require batteries and you can add your own solution !

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 4, 2022
reviews.reviewText: Had new floors put in my house. I was recommended this mop. Its okay. You have to have it lined up perfect for the water solution to spray correctly. I dont like that the product doesnt snap tightly together. But convient yes this is. Quick clean up yes it is. Easy to clean the pads yes.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 5, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars BEST MOP EVER!
reviews.reviewText: It was so easy to put together that my 12 year old boy did it. The pads are thick!!! I did my whole house (we have a ranch that had all wood floors) and I could still use the same pad. The spray is strong when you squeeze the handle. My floors look awesome. Best thing I have ever bought off of Amazon, hands down! It costs prob less than a swifter wet jet. A new Wet jet will run you about 25-28 bucks, PLUS cost for pads, PLUS cost for solution, PLUS cost of batteries. SO...this is a steal...and a GEM!!! LOVE IT!!!!
Muy buena calidad y muy práctico.

reviews.reviewTitle: 少し高いですが良いです！
reviews.reviewText: シャークが動かなくなったので買い替えました。スプレーモップも沢山あって迷いましたが、こちらはモップ部分が大きく、適度に重さもあるので拭きやすいです。好みの洗剤を使えるところも良いです。海外のレビューしか無かったので心配でしたが買って正解。拭き掃除が楽になりました。

reviews.reviewTitle: Te hace la vida mucho más fácil
reviews.reviewText: Me encantó. Armarlo fue sumamente sencillo y funciona a la perfección. He tenido algunos problemas de espalda y trapear era cansado y doloroso. Compré esta mopa pensando justo en eso y la verdad quedé súper complacida porque el movimiento que tengo que hacer es únicamente hacia adelante y hacia atrás y eso es genial. Además, no tengo que estar yendo y viniendo a cambiar el agua para secar. Como la cantidad de agua que sale por el rociador es mucho menor a la que deja un mop tradicional de hebras, pues se seca muy rápido. La almohadilla de microfibra es muy ancha así que puedes limpiar un área mucho más grande. Pude terminar de limpiar la casa como en un cuarto del tiempo que hubiera necesitado con la mopa tradicional. ¡Súper recomendable!
Me gustó porque no tengo que cargar la cubeta al limpiar. Es muy práctico. Solamente que si son superficies muy grandes, se ensucia el trapo y si lo tienes que enjuagar sino embarras la mugre
Llegó todo perfecto. Pero no Me sirvió para mi piso
